unique.base.jei.name: UE Enchantment View
Increased damage against arthropod, like Spiders. Also slows them on hit
enchantment.minecraft.blast_protection.d: Reduces knockback and damage received from explosions
enchantment.minecraft.channeling.desc: During a thunderstorm, causes a lightning bolt to hit the target hit by this thrown trident
enchantment.minecraft.binding_curse.desc: Item cannot be removed from armor slots, unless in Creative Mode or it breaks(/or death)
enchantment.minecraft.vanishing_curse.de: Upon death, item will be destroyed
enchantment.minecraft.efficiency.desc: Improves mining speed. On axes increases chance to stun shields
enchantment.minecraft.fire_protection.de: Reduces fire damage received and burn time
enchantment.minecraft.flame.desc: Incinerates target on hit with arrow
enchantment.minecraft.fortune.desc: Chance to increase yields from certain blocks
enchantment.minecraft.frost_walker.desc: Turns water beneath player into Ice. Prevents damage from magma blocks and campfires
enchantment.minecraft.impaling.desc: Increased damage against natural ocean mobs
enchantment.minecraft.infinity.desc: Prevents normal arrows to be consumed upon shooting
enchantment.minecraft.luck_of_the_sea.de: Improves quality of loot by fishing
enchantment.minecraft.mending.desc: Collected experience orbs are converted into Durability instead of player experience
enchantment.minecraft.protection.desc: Reduces damage received that is not covered by other protection enchantments
enchantment.minecraft.respiration.desc: Allows you to breathe longer underwater
enchantment.minecraft.riptide.desc: While in water or raining, launches player and trident in the direction of throwing
enchantment.minecraft.soul_speed.desc: Improves movement speed on Soul Soil and Soul Sand, in exchange for durability
enchantment.minecraft.thorns.desc: Returns some damage received to the attacking entity, in exchange for durability
enchantment.minecraft.unbreaking.desc: Reduces the chance of an item losing durability
